entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow beginning before morning. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow ending early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
